family_oriented.reason: The attraction is not designed for families or children, focusing on adult group activities.

history_oriented.reason: Some historical tours are offered, but they are not the primary focus of the attraction.

activity_oriented.reason: Participants engage in moderate physical activity by pedaling the bike, which is motor-assisted.

nature_oriented.reason: The attraction is urban-focused with no access to natural scenery or landscapes.

food_oriented.reason: Food is available at some bar stops, but it is not a central feature of the experience.

shopping_oriented.reason: There is no shopping component associated with the attraction.
